definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to remain/to be left/to have as remainder

sentences.english: The survivors of the bowmen, the warriors of Kedar, will be few.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手所餘剩的，就是基達人的勇士，必然稀少。

sentences.english: And the remnant of the Philistines will perish, Says the Lord Jehovah.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人所餘剩的必都滅亡，這是主耶和華說的。

sentences.english: Therefore pray for the remnant that still survives.
sentences.chinese: 故此，求你爲餘剩的民揚聲禱告。

sentences.english: Mother doesn't like to waste money and always eats her son's leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽捨不得浪費，總是自己喫掉兒子餘剩的飯。

sentences.english: For only Og the king of Bashan was left of the remnant of the Rephaim.
sentences.chinese: 巴珊王噩是利乏音人所餘剩僅存的。

sentences.english: I will give all these things as an inheritance to the remnant of this people.
sentences.chinese: 我要使這餘剩的民，享受這一切的福。

sentences.english: In that day shall the LORD of hosts be for a crown of glory, and for a diadem of beauty, unto the residue of his people
sentences.chinese: 到那日，萬軍之耶和華必作他餘剩之民的榮冠華冕。
